00029 class simbio_mysql_result extends simbio
00030 {
00034     private $res_result = false;
00035     private $sql_string = '';
00036 
00040     public $num_rows = 0;
00041     public $field_count = 0;
00042     public $affected_rows = 0;
00043     public $insert_id = 0;
00044     public $errno = false;
00045 
00046 
00053     public function __construct($str_query, $res_conn)
00054     {
00055         $this->sql_string = trim($str_query);
00056         $this->sendQuery($res_conn);
00057     }
00058 
00059 
00066     private function sendQuery($res_conn)
00067     {
00068         // checking query type
00069         // if the query return recordset or not
00070         if (preg_match("/^SELECT|DESCRIBE|SHOW|EXPLAIN\s/i", $this->sql_string)) {
00071             $this->res_result = @mysql_query($this->sql_string, $res_conn);
00072             // error checking
00073             if (!$this->res_result) {
00074                 $this->error = 'Query ('.$this->sql_string.") failed to executed. Please check your query again \n".mysql_error($res_conn);
00075                 $this->errno = mysql_errno($res_conn);
00076             } else {
00077                 // count number of rows
00078                 $this->num_rows = @mysql_num_rows($this->res_result);
00079                 $this->field_count = @mysql_num_fields($this->res_result);
00080             }
00081         } else {
00082             $query = @mysql_query($this->sql_string, $res_conn);
00083             $this->insert_id = @mysql_insert_id($res_conn);
00084             // error checking
00085             if (!$query) {
00086                 $this->error = 'Query ('.$this->sql_string.") failed to executed. Please check your query again \n".mysql_error($res_conn);
00087                 $this->errno = mysql_errno($res_conn);
00088             } else {
00089                 // get number of affected row
00090                 $this->affected_rows = @mysql_affected_rows($res_conn);
00091             }
00092             // nullify query
00093             $query = null;
00094         }
00095     }
00096 
00097 
00103     public function fetch_assoc()
00104     {
00105         return @mysql_fetch_assoc($this->res_result);
00106     }
00107 
00108 
00114     public function fetch_row()
00115     {
00116         return @mysql_fetch_row($this->res_result);
00117     }
00118 
00119 
00125     public function fetch_fields()
00126     {
00127         $_fields_info = array();
00128         $_f = 0;
00129         $_field_num = mysql_num_fields($this->res_result);
00130         while ($_f < $_field_num) {
00131             $_fields_info[] = mysql_fetch_field($this->res_result, $_f);
00132             $_f++;
00133         }
00134 
00135         return $_fields_info;
00136     }
00137 
00138 
00144     public function free_result()
00145     {
00146         if ($this->res_result) {
00147             @mysql_free_result($this->res_result);
00148         }
00149     }
00150 }
